CVE-2012-0025.title: libfpx: Denial of service — GLSA 201605-03
CVE-2012-0025.subTitle: A double free vulnerability has been discovered in libfpx that allows remote attackers to cause a Denial of Service.
CVE-2012-0025.background: A library for manipulating FlashPIX images.
CVE-2012-0025.body: A double free vulnerability has been discovered in the Free_All_Memory function in jpeg/dectile.c.
CVE-2012-0025.extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted FPX image using an application linked against libfpx, possibly resulting in a Denial of Service condition.

CVE-2012-0036.title: cURL: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201203-02
CVE-2012-0036.subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in cURL, the worst of which might allow remote execution of arbitrary code.
CVE-2012-0036.background: cURL is a command line tool for transferring files with URL syntax, supporting numerous protocols.
CVE-2012-0036.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in cURL:
CVE-2012-0036.extra: A remote attacker could entice a user or automated process to open a specially crafted file or URL using cURL, possibly resulting in the remote execution of arbitrary code, a Denial of Service condition, disclosure of sensitive information, or unwanted actions performed via the IMAP, POP3 or SMTP protocols. Furthermore, remote servers may be able to impersonate clients via GSSAPI requests.

CVE-2012-0037.title: LibreOffice: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201209-05
CVE-2012-0037.subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in LibreOffice, allowing remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a Denial of Service.
CVE-2012-0037.background: LibreOffice is a full office productivity suite.
CVE-2012-0037.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in LibreOffice:
CVE-2012-0037.extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted document file using LibreOffice, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or a Denial of Service condition.

CVE-2012-0217.title: Xen: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201309-24
CVE-2012-0217.subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Xen, allowing attackers on a Xen Virtual Machine to execute arbitrary code, cause Denial of Service, or gain access to data on the host.
CVE-2012-0217.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Xen. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.
CVE-2012-0217.extra: Guest domains could possibly gain privileges, execute arbitrary code, or cause a Denial of Service on the host domain (Dom0). Additionally, guest domains could gain information about other virtual machines running on the same host or read arbitrary files on the host.

CVE-2012-0219.title: socat: Arbitrary code execution — GLSA 201208-01
CVE-2012-0219.subTitle: A buffer overflow in socat might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.
CVE-2012-0219.background: socat is a multipurpose bidirectional relay, similar to netcat.
CVE-2012-0219.body: A vulnerability in the "xioscan_readline()" function in xio-readline.c could cause a heap-based buffer overflow.
CVE-2012-0219.extra: A remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the socat process.

CVE-2012-0283.title: DokuWiki: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201301-07
CVE-2012-0283.subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities were found in DokuWiki, the worst of which leading to privilege escalation.
CVE-2012-0283.background: DokuWiki is a simple to use Wiki aimed at a small company’s documentation needs.
CVE-2012-0283.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in DokuWiki. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.
CVE-2012-0283.extra: The vulnerabilities might allow an attacker to disclose local files, to inject arbitrary web script, or to gain elevated privileges in the DokuWiki application.

CVE-2012-0553.title: MySQL: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201308-06
CVE-2012-0553.subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in MySQL, allowing attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause Denial of Service.
CVE-2012-0553.background: MySQL is a fast, multi-threaded, multi-user SQL database server.
CVE-2012-0553.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in MySQL. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.
CVE-2012-0553.extra: A remote attacker could send a specially crafted request, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the application or a Denial of Service condition.

CVE-2012-0752.title: Adobe Flash Player: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201204-07
CVE-2012-0752.subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities in Adobe Flash Player, the worst of which might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.
CVE-2012-0752.background: The Adobe Flash Player is a renderer for the SWF file format, which is commonly used to provide interactive websites.
CVE-2012-0752.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Adobe Flash Player. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.
CVE-2012-0752.extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted SWF file, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or a Denial of Service condition. Furthermore, a remote attacker may be able to bypass intended access restrictions, bypass cross-domain policy, inject arbitrary web script, or obtain sensitive information.

CVE-2012-0802.title: spamdyke: Arbitrary code execution — GLSA 201203-01
CVE-2012-0802.subTitle: A buffer overflow in spamdyke might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.
CVE-2012-0802.background: spamdyke is a drop-in connection-time spam filter for qmail.
CVE-2012-0802.body: Boundary errors related to the "snprintf()" and "vsnprintf()" functions in spamdyke could cause a buffer overflow.
CVE-2012-0802.extra: A remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code or cause a Denial of Service.

CVE-2012-0804.title: CVS: Heap-based overflow — GLSA 201701-44
CVE-2012-0804.subTitle: A heap-based buffer overflow in CVS might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.
CVE-2012-0804.background: CVS (Concurrent Versions System) is an open-source network-transparent version control system. It contains both a client utility and a server.
CVE-2012-0804.body: A heap-based buffer overflow was discovered in the proxy_connect function in src/client.c in CVS.
CVE-2012-0804.extra: An attacker, utilizing a remote HTTP proxy server, could cause a Denial of Service condition or possibly execute arbitrary code via a crafted HTTP response.

CVE-2012-0812.title: Postfixadmin: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201209-18
CVE-2012-0812.subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Postfixadmin which may lead to SQL injection or cross-site scripting attacks.
CVE-2012-0812.background: Postfixadmin is a web-based management tool for Postfix-style virtual domains and users.
CVE-2012-0812.body: Multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities (CVE-2012-0811) and cross-site scripting vulnerabilities (CVE-2012-0812) have been found in Postfixadmin.
CVE-2012-0812.extra: A remote attacker could exploit these vulnerabilities to execute arbitrary SQL statements or arbitrary HTML and script code.

CVE-2012-1118.background: MantisBT is a PHP/MySQL/Web based bugtracking system.
CVE-2012-1118.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in MantisBT. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.
CVE-2012-1118.extra: A remote attacker could exploit these vulnerabilities to conduct directory traversal attacks, disclose the contents of local files, inject arbitrary web scripts, obtain sensitive information, bypass authentication and intended access restrictions, or manipulate bugs and attachments.

CVE-2012-4245.title: GIMP: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201603-01
CVE-2012-4245.subTitle: GIMP is vulnerable to multiple buffer overflows which could result in the execution of arbitrary code or Denial of Service.
CVE-2012-4245.background: GIMP is a cross-platform image editor available for GNU/Linux, OS X, Windows and more operating systems.
CVE-2012-4245.body: GIMP’s network server, scriptfu, is vulnerable to the remote execution of arbitrary code via the python-fu-eval command due to not requiring authentication. Additionally, the X Window Dump (XWD) plugin is vulnerable to multiple buffer overflows possibly allowing the remote execution of arbitrary code or Denial of Service. The XWD plugin is vulnerable due to not validating large color entries.

CVE-2012-5524.subTitle: An error in Gajim causes invalid OpenSSL certificates to be accepted as valid.
CVE-2012-5524.background: Gajim is a Jabber/XMPP client which uses GTK+.
CVE-2012-5524.body: The _ssl_verify_callback() function in tls_nb.py does not properly validate SSL certificates, causing any certificate to be accepted as valid as long as the root CA is valid.
CVE-2012-5524.extra: A remote attacker might employ a specially crafted certificate to conduct man-in-the-middle attacks on SSL connections and potentially disclose sensitive information.

CVE-2012-6150.title: Samba: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201502-15

CVE-2012-6150.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Samba. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.
CVE-2012-6150.extra: A context-dependent attacker may be able to execute arbitrary code, cause a Denial of Service condition, bypass intended file restrictions, or obtain sensitive information.

CVE-2012-6303.title: Snack: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 201309-04
CVE-2012-6303.subTitle: A buffer overflow in Snack could result in execution of arbitrary code or Denial of Service.
CVE-2012-6303.background: Snack is a sound toolkit for creating multi-platform audio applications with scripting languages.
CVE-2012-6303.body: The GetWavHeader() function in jkSoundFile.c does not have boundary checks when parsing format sub-chunks or unknown sub-chunks.
CVE-2012-6303.extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted WAV file with an application using Snack, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code or a Denial of Service condition.

CVE-2012-6496.extra: A remote attacker could use specially crafted input to execute arbitrary SQL statements.

CVE-2012-6697.title: InspIRCd: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201512-13
CVE-2012-6697.subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in InspIRCd, the worst allowing remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.
CVE-2012-6697.background: InspIRCd is a modular Internet Relay Chat (IRC) server written in C++ which was created from scratch to be stable, modern and lightweight.

CVE-2012-6702.title: Expat: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201701-21
CVE-2012-6702.subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Expat, the worst of which may allow execution of arbitrary code.
CVE-2012-6702.background: Expat is a set of XML parsing libraries.
CVE-2012-6702.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Expat. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.
CVE-2012-6702.extra: A remote attacker, by enticing a user to process a specially crafted XML file, could execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or cause a Denial of Service condition. This attack could also be used against automated systems that arbitrarily process XML files.

CVE-2012-6706.title: RAR and UnRAR: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 201708-05
CVE-2012-6706.subTitle: An integer overflow in RAR and UnRAR might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.
CVE-2012-6706.background: RAR and UnRAR provide command line interfaces for compressing and decompressing RAR files.
CVE-2012-6706.body: A VMSF_DELTA memory corruption was discovered in which an integer overflow can be caused in DataSize+CurChannel. The result is a negative value of the “DestPos” variable which allows writing out of bounds when setting Mem[DestPos].
CVE-2012-6706.extra: A remote attacker, by enticing a user to open a specially crafted archive, could execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process.

CVE-2012-6706.title: RAR, UnRAR: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201709-24
CVE-2012-6706.subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in RAR and UnRAR, the worst of which may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code.
CVE-2012-6706.background: RAR and UnRAR provide command line interfaces for compressing and decompressing RAR files.
CVE-2012-6706.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in RAR and UnRAR. Please review the referenced CVE identifiers for details.
CVE-2012-6706.extra: A remote attacker, by enticing a user to open a specially crafted RAR, could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or cause a Denial of Service condition.

CVE-2012-6706.title: ClamAV: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201804-16
CVE-2012-6706.subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in ClamAV, the worst of which may allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.
CVE-2012-6706.background: ClamAV is a GPL virus scanner.
CVE-2012-6706.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in ClamAV. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.
